Package cams.suggestion.suggester_controllers

Class CommitteeSuggesterController

java.lang.Object
cams.suggestion.suggester_controllers.CommitteeSuggesterController
All Implemented Interfaces:
SuggesterController, java.io.Serializable
public class CommitteeSuggesterController
extends java.lang.Object
implements SuggesterController, java.io.Serializable
Class responsible for handling the submission, editing, and deletion of suggestions. Extends the SuggesterUI and provides implementations for submit, edit, and delete methods.
See Also:

  • Method Details

    • submit

      public boolean submit​(java.lang.String campName, User user, java.lang.String text)
      Submits a new suggestion to a specified camp.

      This method creates a new post of type PostType.SUGGESTION and associates it with the specified camp. If the user is a committee member, a point is added for the submission.

      Specified by:
      submit in interface SuggesterController
      Parameters:
      campName - The name of the camp to which the suggestion is being submitted.
      user - The user submitting the suggestion.
      text - The content of the suggestion.
      Returns:
      true if the submission is successful, false if the camp does not exist.

    • edit

      public boolean edit​(User user, int postIndex, java.lang.String content)
      Edits an existing suggestion.

      This method updates the content of an existing suggestion post.

      Specified by:
      edit in interface SuggesterController
      Parameters:
      user - The user who owns the suggestion.
      postIndex - The index of the suggestion in the user's list of suggestions.
      content - The new content for the suggestion.
      Returns:
      true if the edit is successful, false if the user does not exist.

    • delete

      public boolean delete​(User user, int postIndex)
      Deletes a suggestion.

      This method removes a suggestion post. Suggestions that have been responded to cannot be deleted.

      Specified by:
      delete in interface SuggesterController
      Parameters:
      user - The user who owns the suggestion.
      postIndex - The index of the suggestion in the user's list of suggestions.
      Returns:
      true if the deletion is successful, false if the user does not exist or the suggestion has responses.

    • getSuggestions

      public java.util.List<Post> getSuggestions​(User user)
      Collects all suggestions posted by the student user to the camp that they are a committee member of.
      Specified by:
      getSuggestions in interface SuggesterController
      Parameters:
      user - The user requesting their list of suggestions.
      Returns:
      A list of Post objects representing suggestions.
